article:

A large   number of  U.S. presidents had
experiences in the  _  .The two best  known  were Ulysses Grant and Dwight D. Eisenhower. Grant was a general in the
American Civil War and Eisenhower was a hero in the Second World War.
The jobs of the U.S. presidents are tiring. He must   _  an eye on  _  important  _  happens  both  at home and abroad.
Everyday, a lot of  _  waits for him to do.  _  , he has to make many important  _  . When Franklin
Roosevelt was a child, he was once brought to visit President Taft. The old
president said to him, "When you  grow up  ,you should not be  president  .It's  a tiring  job."
